mapper.update: update website_user set loginUserName = #{loginusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, errorCount = #{errorcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, registerTime = #{registertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, loginUserName, `state`, errorCount, registerTime, sex, `name` from website_user
